mapper.select: SELECT A.AUC_PRG_SQ /* 원표번호 */ , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분코드 */ , B.FTSNM /* 출하주명 */ , SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS SRA_INDV_AMNNO /* 축산개체관리번호 */ , C.MATIME /* 산차 */ , C.SRA_INDV_PASG_QCN /* 계대 */ , SUBSTR(C.BIRTH, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(C.BIRTH, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(C.BIRTH, 7, 2) AS BIRTH /* 생년월일 */ , C.INDV_SEX_C /* 개체성별코드 */ , A.COW_SOG_WT /* 우출하중량 */ , C.MCOW_DSC /* 어미소구분코드 */ , 0 AS SANJUNG1 /* 수기입력1 */ , 0 AS SANJUNG2 /* 수기입력2 */ , 0 AS SANJUNG3 /* 수기입력3 */ , 0 AS SANJUNG4 /* 수기입력4 */ , CASE A.AUC_OBJ_DSC WHEN '1' THEN A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM/D.CALF_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM WHEN '2' THEN A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM/D.NBFCT_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM ELSE A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM/D.PPGCOW_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM END AS LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , A.AUC_DT /* 경매일자 */ , A.LED_SQNO /* 원장일련번호 */ , A.FHS_ID_NO /* 농가식별번호 */ , A.FARM_AMNNO /* 농장관리번호 */ , A.FIR_LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM /* 최초최저낙착한도금액 */ , A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM /* 최저낙찰한도금액 */ , A.SEL_STS_DSC /* 판매상태구분코드 */ , D.CALF_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM /* 송아지응찰단위금액 */ , D.NBFCT_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM /* 비육우응찰단위금액 */ , D.PPGCOW_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM /* 번식우응찰단위금액 */ , A.OSLP_NO /* 원표번호 */ FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV C , TB_LA_IS_MM_ENV_EST D WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '11' AND A.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC
